name: How Did We Get Into This Mess?
Lore: 'Stranded in the Dune Sea, R2-D2 insisted on heading into rocky canyons where he thought settlements were likely to exist. Threepio had other ideas.',
Text: 'If one of your droids is at the Dune Sea or where there is a Scomp link, use 1 Force to discard your entire hand to your Used Pile. Draw the same number of cards from your Reserve Deck. Draw one extra card if droid is C- 3PO or R2-D2.',
